title: Unique Chromas are unselectable
body:
some friends have bought your unique chromas for PI and they are complaining that there is no way to select them!
WHAT A BUG

replies.body: I'd like to help but I don't really understand the issue.  Can you provide some more details on what's happening, and the exact skin or chromas that are involved?  Let me know!
It seems one has to restart the client in order for recently bought chromas to be selectable, to in all cases, but it happened to me with red fizz
